item.title: **Image** post
item.description: Hello! I’m a blog post with an image. Thanks to Open Graph and Twitter metadata, external links to this page will feature the image below. To make this happen, set the images parameter in your post’s front-matter, like this YAML example: images: - /posts/ideas.png
